summary: 获取修正模板列表信息。

schema.description: 修正类型。仅支持OOS（运维编排）。

规则模板标识。

关于如何获取规则模板标识，请参见[ListCompliancePackTemplates](~~261176~~)。
修正模板列表的页码。起始值：1。

分页查询时设置的每页行数。

取值范围：1~100，默认值：20。

RemediationType.description: 修正类型。仅支持OOS（运维编排）。

TemplateName.example: 设置OSS Bucket的访问权限为私有。

TemplateDefinition.example: {   "Parameters": {     "bucketName": {       "Default": "{resourceId}",       "Description": {         "zh-cn": "[Required]OSS Bucket名称。",         "en": "[Required]OSS Bucket名称。"       },       "Type": "String"     },     "regionId": {       "AssociationProperty": "RegionId",       "Default": "{regionId}",       "Description": {         "zh-cn": "[Required]The id of target region.",         "en": "[Required]The id of target region."       },       "Type": "String"     },     "permissionName": {       "AllowValues": "[\"public-read-write\",\"public-read\",\"private\"]",       "Default": "private",       "Description": {         "zh-cn": "[Required]ACL权限名称。",         "en": "[Required]ACL权限名称。"       },       "Type": "String"     }   } }

TemplateDescription.example: 通过接口PutBucketACL，设置或修改存储空间（Bucket）的访问权限（ACL），请您知晓风险谨慎操作。

PageNumber.description: 修正模板列表的页码。起始值：1。

PageSize.description: 分页查询时设置的每页行数。取值范围：1~100。

400.errorMessage: You are not authorized to perform this operation.

503.errorMessage: The request has failed due to a temporary failure of the server.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "FC2C4750-7024-499C-A69F-763543D1CBE3",
  "RemediationTemplates": [
    {
      "RemediationType": "OOS",
      "TemplateIdentifier": "ACS-OSS-PutBucketAcl",
      "TemplateName": "设置OSS Bucket的访问权限为私有。",
      "TemplateDefinition": "{   \"Parameters\": {     \"bucketName\": {       \"Default\": \"{resourceId}\",       \"Description\": {         \"zh-cn\": \"[Required]OSS Bucket名称。\",         \"en\": \"[Required]OSS Bucket名称。\"       },       \"Type\": \"String\"     },     \"regionId\": {       \"AssociationProperty\": \"RegionId\",       \"Default\": \"{regionId}\",       \"Description\": {         \"zh-cn\": \"[Required]The id of target region.\",         \"en\": \"[Required]The id of target region.\"       },       \"Type\": \"String\"     },     \"permissionName\": {       \"AllowValues\": \"[\\\"public-read-write\\\",\\\"public-read\\\",\\\"private\\\"]\",       \"Default\": \"private\",       \"Description\": {         \"zh-cn\": \"[Required]ACL权限名称。\",         \"en\": \"[Required]ACL权限名称。\"       },       \"Type\": \"String\"     }   } }",
      "TemplateDescription": "通过接口PutBucketACL，设置或修改存储空间（Bucket）的访问权限（ACL），请您知晓风险谨慎操作。"
    }
  ],
  "PageNumber": 1,
  "PageSize": 10,
  "TotalCount": "1"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<ListRemediationTemplatesResponse>
    <RequestId>FC2C4750-7024-499C-A69F-763543D1CBE3</RequestId>
    <RemediationTemplates>
        <RemediationType>OOS</RemediationType>
        <TemplateIdentifier>ACS-OSS-PutBucketAcl</TemplateIdentifier>
        <TemplateName>设置OSS Bucket的访问权限为私有。</TemplateName>
        <TemplateDefinition>{   "Parameters": {     "bucketName": {       "Default": "{resourceId}",       "Description": {         "zh-cn": "[Required]OSS Bucket名称。",         "en": "[Required]OSS Bucket名称。"       },       "Type": "String"     },     "regionId": {       "AssociationProperty": "RegionId",       "Default": "{regionId}",       "Description": {         "zh-cn": "[Required]The id of target region.",         "en": "[Required]The id of target region."       },       "Type": "String"     },     "permissionName": {       "AllowValues": "[\"public-read-write\",\"public-read\",\"private\"]",       "Default": "private",       "Description": {         "zh-cn": "[Required]ACL权限名称。",         "en": "[Required]ACL权限名称。"       },       "Type": "String"     }   } }</TemplateDefinition>
    </RemediationTemplates>
</ListRemediationTemplatesResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取修正模板列表
description: 本文将提供一个示例，查询托管规则`oss-bucket-public-write-prohibited`的修正模板详情。返回结果为修正类型`OOS`（运维编排）的模板详情。
requestParamsDescription: 关于公共请求参数的详情，请参见[公共参数](~~251751~~)。
